item.runology.blink_boots.tooltip_2: Holding %1$s will show where the target position will be
book.runology.guidebook.name: Runic Codex
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.discover: I feel a strange and mysterious force... For whatever reason, I feel as if I should imbue a book with this power.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.gu: After imbuing that strange power into a book, I have obtained powerful knowledge, this path, it may lead me to power! However... I can't help but wonder... What is that voice in my head telling me all of this?
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.sh: These holes in space appear to lead to somewhere else, while I may not be able to cross them, I may be able to extract energy from them. I will call this energy "Shattered Flow" however if I attempt to drain too much Shattered Flow from one, it may become unstable...
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.ba: There are 4 runes I can utilize to manipulate the world: [#](ff5d00)Heat[#](), [#](00d1ff)Frost[#](), [#](00ff00)Shape[#]() and [#](ffd100)Motion[#](). Utilizing these 4 is powerful but there has to be more...
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.sh: This stone... I have never seen it before however after discovering a shatter, I have started seeing it everywhere in caves... Is there more to this world than what I can see?
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.ru: While I know about runes, I do not have a method to create them, a Runic Chisel will work, to obtain one, I will have to imbue a gold chisel with Shattered Flow.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.sh: That energy I felt nearby a Shatter... It was powerful yet dangerous and otherworldly, this energy... I will call it "Shattered Flow" however I will need a method to move it around, Shattered Focuses and Shattered Relays will work!

Now that I am able to move around Shattered Flow, It may be useful to be able to charge items with it without having to walk all the way to a Shatter, the Shattered Infuser will allow me to do this at the cost of 50 Shattered Flow to run.
With how Shatters output a limited number of Shattered Flow and have stability to them, it may be useful to create a tool to let me measure a Shatters Stability, Power, and Output.
Using the Runic Chisel, I can carve runes into Shatterstone, allowing me to channel Shattered Flow properly.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.basics.re: While Shatters are useful, sometimes they may be created at an inconvenient location. This Reality Reshaper structure will allow me to remove a Shatter and I might even gain something incredibly useful... although... I feel as if it wont go peacefully...
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.shards.sh: Shattered Shards... A physical manifestation of shattered flow. Utilizing this may be the key to more advanced magic.
modonomicon.runology.guidebook.shards.bl: Shattered Shards, when combined with gold, I can make boots capable of letting me teleport forwards, I will call this form of teleportation a "Blink"
advancements.runology.runology.title: Runology
advancements.runology.shatter.title: Shatters
advancements.runology.shatter.descriptio: Discover a shatter in the world
advancements.runology.shatterstone.title: Shatterstone
misc.runology.power_activate: I feel power flowing through my body, building up at my fists, whatever this power is... It may be what is needed.
